715.question: To what other competitive baselines is this approach compared?

5-Table1-1.png: The approach is compared to VHRED (attn) and MMI in the table.

715.answer: LSTMs with and without attention, HRED, VHRED with and without attention, MMI and Reranking-RL

717.question: How much better were results of the proposed models than base LSTM-RNN model?

5-Table1-1.png: The proposed models were significantly better than the base LSTM-RNN model, with statistically significant higher F1 values in all four models compared to VHRED (attn) and MMI.

717.answer: on diversity 6.87 and on relevance 4.6 points higher

718.question: Which one of the four proposed models performed best?

5-Table1-1.png: The four proposed models are LSTM, HRED, VHRED (attn), and Reranking-RL. The best performing model is LSTM.
7-Table4-1.png: The table shows the results of the four proposed models. The best-performing model is the one that has the highest accuracy rate. However, without knowing the specific accuracy rates for each model, it is not possible to determine which one performed the best.
